wilescollection.config.title: WilE's Collection Config
block.wilescollection.crafting_table.hel:
A Crafting Table with two rows of inventory, recipe collision resolver, quick selection of last used recipes, and small crafting tweaks:
Mouse-scroll over the output slot to increase/decrease the item count in the crafting grid. Shift-click items distributes equally in the crafting grid. Ctrl-shift moves all stacks between inventories. Click the output slot with an item to automatically search and select the first possible recipe.
block.wilescollection.crate.help: A simple crate that keeps its inventory when being relocated. It shows the item placed into the bottom-left Item Frame slot.
block.wilescollection.crate.tip:
§6Label:§r %1$s
%2$s slots used / %3$s free
%4$s total items stored
---
%5$s
block.wilescollection.fluid_barrel.help: Wooden Barrel storing up to 12 buckets of liquid.
block.wilescollection.ladder.help: Ladder with a really good grip. Look up or down to climb faster.
item.wilescollection.peculiar_ring.help: Strange Ring that can repair your armor and tools. Toss it on top of an Anvil and drop Lapis Lazuli on it. This will charge it up with effects. Pick up the ring and see which effects were added by hovering the item in your inventory.
